content.raw:
ook, I think that we don't need to modify anything in this pull request, right?

My point is: we should sync the s3 container with all our current releases now in assets/, mail gazebosim so our downstream developers know about the new location and merge this pull request. From that moment on, we will consider the old assets/ dead and only use the s3 container.
content.html:
ook, I think that we don't need to modify anything in this pull request, right?

My point is: we should sync the s3 container with all our current releases now in assets/, mail gazebosim so our downstream developers know about the new location and merge this pull request. From that moment on, we will consider the old assets/ dead and only use the s3 container.
